item.title: 尽管市场反弹，但 Man Group 仍坚持看跌新兴市场债务的观点
item.description: 全球最大的上市对冲基金 Man Group 正在加倍押注其多年来一直持有的新兴市场美元债券，称由于通胀抑制了美国降息的前景，美元债券将面临严峻的现实考验。【原文：Man Group, the world’s largest publicly traded hedge fund, is doubling down on a contrarian bet that it has held on emerging-market dollar bonds for years, saying the debt is set for a harsh reality check as inflation damps the outlook for US interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 交易员抛开通胀担忧，英国债务引领债券反弹
item.description: 周三，尽管通胀数据火热，有可能放缓英格兰银行的降息步伐，但吉尔伯特债券摆脱了长达一周的跌势，大幅飙升。【原文：Gilts broke out of a week-long slide on Wednesday, surging despite a hot inflation number that threatens to slow the pace of interest rate cuts by the Bank of England.】

item.title: 印度储备银行称暂停评估关税对经济的影响
item.description: 印度央行周三的政策会议记录显示，印度利率制定者决定暂停加息，以评估美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税对亚洲第三大经济体的影响。【原文：India’s rate-setters decided to pause interest rates to assess the impact of US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs on Asia’s third largest economy, minutes of the central bank’s policy meeting showed Wednesday.】

item.title: 纳米比亚暂停油港升级计划以明确项目范围
item.description: 纳米比亚港务局推迟了对南部港口进行升级改造的计划，以帮助发展该国新兴的石油和天然气产业，直至有关工程的信息得到澄清。【原文：Namibia’s port authority delayed plans to upgrade a southern harbor needed to help develop the nation’s emerging oil and gas industry until information about the work is clarified.】

item.title: 随着贸易担忧减弱，瑞典现在预计 2026 年将实现更快增长
item.description: 瑞典政府上调了对明年经济增长的预期，称美国关税不确定性的减少应使家庭在未来几个月开始增加消费。【原文：Sweden’s government raised its projection for economic growth next year, saying reduced uncertainty over US tariffs should allow households to begin consuming more over the coming months.】

item.title: 迪拜酒店将派对文化和病毒式传播变成大生意
item.description: 在迪拜 FIVE 旗舰酒店的露天剧场式泳池，数百名宾客在烈日下品尝鸡尾酒，丝毫不受沙漠高温的影响。这与其说是一次酒店住宿，不如说是一场社交盛宴。对于这家酒店集团的董事长兼创始人来说，这种热闹是商业模式的一部分。【原文：At the amphitheater-style pool in FIVE’s flagship property in Dubai, hundreds of guests sip cocktails under the blazing sun, unfazed by the desert heat. It’s less a hotel stay than a social spectacle. For the hospitality group’s chairman and founder, that buzz is part of the business model.】

item.title: AQR 的 "难以相信 "研究引发人工智能用于计算的冲突
item.description: 华尔街的经济学家和顶尖的金融学者正在就人工智能是否颠覆了系统投资的核心原则之一发生冲突。【原文：Wall Street quants and leading financial academics are clashing over whether artificial intelligence has upended one of the core principles of systematic investing.】

item.title: FLSmidth 首席执行官表示，出售资产后，FLSmidth 有能力开展大型并购活动
item.description: FLSmidth & Co.A/S公司首席执行官Mikko Keto表示，该公司在6月份同意出售两项大型资产，现在有能力进行大型收购，因为这家丹麦工程集团的资产负债表已得到加强。【原文：FLSmidth & Co. A/S, which agreed to sell two large assets in June, now has the ability to conduct large acquisitions because the Danish engineering group’s balance sheet has been strengthened, Chief Executive Officer Mikko Keto said.】

item.title: InCommodities 聘用前贡渥集团高管领导美国业务扩张
item.description: 贡渥集团前北美天然气和电力主管将于下月初加入能源交易商InCommodities A/S，帮助推动其美国分部的建设。【原文：Gunvor Group’s former head of North American natural gas and power will join energy trader InCommodities A/S early next month to help drive the build-out of its US division.】

item.title: 小麦连跌两日，需求和俄罗斯供应成为关注焦点
item.description: 小麦在芝加哥小幅走高，结束了连续两日的跌势，因为市场消化了俄罗斯供应增加的预期和新的需求迹象。【原文：Wheat nudged higher in Chicago, snapping a two-day decline, as the market digests expectations of bigger Russian supplies and fresh signs of demand.】

item.title: 白糖溢价扩大至 13 个月高点，因巴基斯坦买盘所致
item.description: 由于巴基斯坦的采购促进了对精制甜味剂的需求，白糖对原糖的溢价扩大到一年多以来的最高水平。【原文：White sugar’s premium to the raw variety widened to the highest in more than a year as purchases by Pakistan boost demand for the refined sweetener.】

item.title: 亚马逊联合 AMD 支持韩国人工智能初创企业 Upstage
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Upstage从亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.）和先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.）等投资者处融资4500万美元，用于加速开发其下一代模型，并在美国和亚太地区拓展业务。【原文：AI startup Upstage raised $45 million from investors including Amazon.com Inc. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. to accelerate development of its next-generation model and expand in the US and the Asia-Pacific region.】

item.title: 印度公司收益率将因财政风险创 2022 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 印度企业的借贷成本将以两年多来最快的速度攀升，因为人们越来越担心政府的减税措施可能会导致借贷增加，并挤压发行商的生存空间。【原文：Borrowing costs for Indian companies are set to climb at the fastest pace in more than two years, as concerns mount that the government’s tax cuts may result in higher borrowing and squeeze out issuers.】

item.title: 特朗普推动铜业发展未能获得矿业首席执行官们想要的决议
item.description:
力拓和必和必拓在亚利桑那州的联合项目可满足美国25%的需求，但法院刚刚阻止了一项至关重要的土地置换。【原文：

A joint Rio Tinto, BHP project in Arizona could supply 25% of US demand, but a court just blocked a crucial land swap.

】

item.title: 摩根大通和加拿大皇家银行的保证金贷款适得其反，首席执行官损失了大部分股票
item.description: 戴夫-谢弗（Dave Schaeffer）为避免自己三十多年来在华盛顿特区建立的地产帝国崩溃，已经黔驴技穷。【原文：Dave Schaeffer is running out of options to stave off the collapse of the Washington, DC, property empire he built over three decades.】

item.title: Coinbase 押注数字美元推动的人工智能支付崛起
item.description: 在布鲁克林一个充满工业时尚气息的活动空间里，来自马来西亚和意大利的约 100 名工程师在酷热的八月周末与时间赛跑。这些精通技术的人参加了 Coinbase Global Inc. 的 "加密货币 x 人工智能 "黑客马拉松比赛，他们将聊天机器人和移动应用程序连接到数字美元上运行，打赌稳定币（曾被认为是加密货币最无聊的发明）可能会成为新人工智能时代的管道。【原文：In an industrial-chic event space in Brooklyn, about 100 engineers from Malaysia to Italy spent a sweltering August weekend racing against the clock. The tech-savvy crowd was competing at Coinbase Global Inc.’s “Crypto x AI” hackathon, wiring chatbots and mobile apps to run on digital dollars in a bet that stablecoins — once dismissed as crypto’s dullest invention — could become the plumbing of the new AI age.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 就价值 110 亿美元的 Dayforce 交易进行深入谈判
item.description: Thoma Bravo 正在就收购人力资源软件供应商 Dayforce Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo is in advanced talks to buy human resources software provider Dayforce Inc. in what would be one of its largest-ever deals.】

item.title: Trafigura 聘请 Olam 植物油贸易商拓展生物燃料业务
item.description: Trafigura 集团从 Olam 集团有限公司聘用了两名植物油贸易商，从而加强了其在生物燃料领域的推进力度。【原文：Trafigura Group has strengthened its push into biofuels by hiring two vegetable oil traders from Olam Group Ltd.】

item.title: 英国通胀为何如此之高及其对利率的影响
item.description: 尽管大流行病后爆发的通货膨胀在发达国家的大部分地区都有所缓解，但在西方主要经济体中，英国的物价增长速度仍然是最高的。【原文：While a post-pandemic burst of inflation has abated across much of the developed world, the UK is still stuck with the highest price growth among big Western economies.】

item.title: 伦敦住房租金自大流行病以来首次下降
item.description: 官方数据显示，自2021年英国摆脱科维德限制以来，伦敦的私人住房租金在7月份首次走低，这表明首都的生活成本危机正在开始缓解。【原文：Private housing rents in London edged lower in July for the first time since 2021 when the UK was emerging from Covid restrictions, a sign that the capital’s cost-of-living crisis is starting to ease, according to official data.】

item.title: 投资者重投对冲基金，资金流入创十年新高
item.description: 投资者以十年来最快的速度向对冲基金投入资金，希望动荡的市场能带来超额回报。【原文：Investors have been pouring money into hedge funds at the fastest rate in a decade, hoping volatile markets will produce outsized returns.】

item.title: 基金以冬季以来最快速度削减对欧洲天然气的多头押注
item.description: 基金削减了对欧洲天然气价格将以去年冬季以来最快速度上涨的投机性多头押注，这表明人们越来越相信，随着贸易商在供暖季节来临前加强囤积，对供应的担忧将有所缓解。【原文：Funds cut speculative long bets that European gas prices will rise at the fastest pace since last winter, signaling growing conviction that supply worries are set to ease as traders ramp up stockpiling ahead of the heating season.】

item.title: 黑客入侵 85 万个比利时 Orange 公司客户账户
item.description: Orange SA 的比利时业务部门称，黑客获取了 85 万个客户账户的数据，这是今年针对这家法国电信公司的第三次重大网络攻击。【原文：Orange SA’s Belgian business said that hackers gained access to data from 850,000 customer accounts, in the third major cyberattack targeting the French telecommunications firm this year.】

item.title: 人工智能正在虹吸风险投资资金，引发泡沫破裂之说
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，凯特-克拉克（Kate Clark）将报道最新的风险投资统计数据，该数据再次表明人工智能初创企业在资金募集方面占据主导地位。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kate Clark reports on the latest venture capital investing statistics, which again show artificial intelligence startups are dominating the fundraising.】

item.title: 受制于国内市场，中国电动汽车冠军正走向世界
item.description: 我是恩达-柯兰，驻华盛顿的经济记者。今天我们关注中国对外投资的一个片断。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Enda Curran, an economics correspondent in Washington. Today we’re looking at a slice of China’s outbound investment. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧洲 DHL 快递公司总裁称全球贸易 "大到不能倒
item.description: 欧洲 DHL 快递公司首席执行官迈克-帕拉（Mike Parra）正在实时观察美国提高关税后全球货物贸易的变化。【原文：Mike Parra, the CEO of DHL Express Europe, is watching in real time how global goods trade is shifting as the US increases tariffs.】

item.title: 甲骨文借助与 OpenAI 和 Nvidia 的重大交易扭转云计算业务局面
item.description: 甲骨文公司的拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）曾经对云计算的概念嗤之以鼻，他在2008年说，云计算 "完全是胡言乱语"。【原文：Oracle Corp.’s Larry Ellison used to scoff at the idea of cloud computing, saying in 2008 that it was “complete gibberish.”】

item.title: 美国 IPO 市场升温，人工智能和加密货币公司加快计划步伐
item.description: 在今年夏天热火朝天的美国新股发行市场上，首日涨幅达到三位数的公司屡见不鲜，而那些标榜自己与人工智能和加密行业有联系的公司正在加快上市步伐。【原文：Companies touting their artificial intelligence and crypto-sector ties are speeding up their IPO timelines, after triple-digit first-day pops became a regular feature in this summer’s sizzling US market for new issues.】

item.title: 许多人预期的股市大幅回调尚未到来
item.description: 尽管周二出现了震荡，但自 4 月份以来一直推动美国股市大幅回升的论调仍然具有支撑作用，因为推动股市反弹的因素仍然完好无损。【原文：Despite Tuesday’s wobble, the narrative that has been fueling the sharp recovery in US equities since April remains supportive as the drivers of the rally are still intact.】

item.title: 空客飞机订单完成在即，中国航企分食空客飞机
item.description: 中国南方航空股份有限公司（China Southern Airlines Co., 简称 "南航"）和中国国际航空股份有限公司（Air China Ltd.，简称 "国航"）等中国航空公司已开始瓜分500架空客SE喷气机的订单。【原文：China Southern Airlines Co. and Air China Ltd. are among the Chinese airlines that have started dividing up an order of 500 Airbus SE jets in a deal that Beijing is still looking for an opportune time to announce, people familiar with the matter said.】
